concept.title: Typical DB sizes to be used for Aerospike License Costs

section.title: Overview
section.p: The Dimensioning Tool provides the exact Aerospike database size that is used for Aerospike licensing. However, the following approximations can be used for quick, rough approximations.
Note that these numbers are for licensing purposes only, and not for determining VM/VNF requirements, as Aerospike does not include local replication as part of its licensing costs.
Also note that the Dimensioning Tool could calculate higher or lower values, depending on the TPS.

note.p: The Dimensioning Tool does not capture the cost per se, but the size of the database is used to calculate the cost on the vBoM tool.

section.title: Typical Aerospike license size for Policy
section.p: 5 GB for 1M devices and 1M sessions. Includes SM.

section.title: Typical Aerospike license size for Charging
section.p: 15 GB for 1M devices and 1M sessions. Includes SM
